Reviews.Title: nice simple box
Reviews.Author: mark filstein
Reviews.Content: easy to install and works fine so far, not much else to say, my installer did it in a few minutes

Reviews.Title: No issues here!
Reviews.Author: Aji
Reviews.Content: The power supply works great. After 3 weeks installed. Only concern is that the on/off toggles inside the panel do not turn the outputs off. Not a huge deal, but would be nice feature during service calls. Also, replaceable fuses would be a plus

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Stone
Reviews.Content: Arrived in a timely manor and exactly as described.  This Power supply cleared up a lot of room behind my media center

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Charlie Brown
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what I expected it to do, glad that I could order on line rather than have to go to store to pick up

Reviews.Title: Power Distribution Box
Reviews.Author: Jorge Alexandres
Reviews.Content: Thus device is useful for small sites were there is no need to install more than 16 video surveillance devices, I find it cost-effective and of good quality. I would recommend it anytime to anybody looking for these type of devices.

ProductInfo.Features:
12V DC, 18 port regulated power supply
Individual PTC Output Protection
Max 10 Amp total. Maxim for each port is 0.55Amp
Individual LED power Indication
Metal Case with lock. 6 ft power cord
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 18 Channel Port Output 12V DC PTC Fuse Distributed Power Supply Box for Security Cameras CCTV Home Surveillance System C52
